issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The current default template https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/tree/master/android/templates/app/default/template/Resources/android
still uses a normal icon and splashscreen. It would help new users and improve the look and feel if it would already use a 9-splash splashscreen and an adaptive icon.

comments.body:
Those default.png files in (and subfolders):
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/tree/master/android/templates/app/default/template/Resources/android
could be replaced with:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/android/templates/app/angular-default/template/src/assets/android/default.9.png
